phase_name: Convert Development Rules to Machine-Readable Format
objective: Convert DEVELOPMENT RULES DO and DONT.md to Spec-Doc v1 format with stable section IDs (DR-*) and metadata index

acceptance_tests.description: All sections have stable DR-* IDs
acceptance_tests.command: python -c "import re, json; data=open('specs/metadata/dr_index.json').read(); ids=re.findall(r'DR-(DO|DONT)-\d{3}', data); print(len(ids) >= 10)"

acceptance_tests.description: Index contains section metadata with DO and DONT categories
acceptance_tests.command: python -c "import json; d=json.load(open('specs/metadata/dr_index.json')); print('sections' in d and len(d['sections']) > 0)"

acceptance_tests.description: Spec follows markdown format with DR categories
acceptance_tests.command: python -c "import re; content=open('specs/DEV_RULES_V1.md').read(); print('##' in content and 'DR-DO-' in content and 'DR-DONT-' in content)"

deliverables: specs/DEV_RULES_V1.md with all rules tagged with DR-DO-* and DR-DONT-* IDs
specs/metadata/dr_index.json with rule index and metadata
notes: Part of parallel group GROUP-1. Can execute simultaneously with PH-1A and PH-1B as they have non-overlapping file scopes. This phase is critical for building the guard rules engine in PH-2B.
